projects.title: Selected Projects
projects.description: A collection of my work ranging from game jams to long-term productions. All artwork shown is vector-based, created using Affinity Designer or Adobe Illustrator.

items.title: Waterfall Shrine
items.description: A featured artwork demo for a long-term RPG project. This scene showcases a dynamic isometric environment with waterfalls, vegetation, and a lore-rich fox statue that grants player abilities.

items.title: Crow's Ascent
items.description: A tight platformer made for Secret Santa 2024. You start as a 'human' but slowly reveal your true form as a crow, gaining flight mechanics like double and triple jumps to navigate a perilous cloudy sky.

items.title: Soda Pop Rush
items.description: My first completed solo game jam entry. A physics-defying platformer where swimming in soda reverses gravity. Exploding soda cans provide infinite fluid sources for creative navigation.

items.title: Viral Defense
items.description: A biological tower defense game set inside the brain. Deploy specialized viruses to destroy 'knowledge books' entering through the eyes and ears before they are absorbed.

items.title: Asteroid Assault
items.description: A side-scrolling shooter where you collect game chips to drastically alter your ship's firing patterns. My first ever game jam project.

items.title: Farm Tools Survival
items.description: A survival farming sim where you play as the tools themselves. Farm by day, but defend against attacking animals by night. Created with a team for a game jam.

items.title: Space Whale Circuit
items.description: A 4-player multiplayer party game. Players traverse space circuits using a dice-like charge mechanic. Summon the Space Whale to twist the board layout.

items.title: Rising Tides
items.description: An experimental isometric platformer where you must ascend rapidly to escape rising water levels. Features Lottie animations and Bevy Vello integration.

items.title: Ghost Atmosphere
items.description: A personal art project exploring horror atmospheres in an isometric perspective. Created entirely in Affinity Designer.

items.title: Data Bot
items.description: A data-themed platformer where you play as a robot navigating through cloud storage and graphs. Created for a data-themed game jam.

items.title: Isometric Dungeon
items.description: A college project where you navigate a triangle hero through lava, acid, and spikes. I handled all vector artwork for this GameMaker Studio 2 title.

items.title: Robo Delivery
items.description: An isometric puzzle game about delivering parcels to power up or power down lasers to clear your path.

items.title: RPG Town Assets
items.description: A comprehensive isometric asset demo featuring a bookshop and spell shop set in a desert cliff town. Created for reusable asset libraries.

items.title: Infinite Ace
items.description: A classic top-down infinite scrolling shoot 'em up. Defend the skies against waves of enemy planes.
